bug.short_desc: Library resources not copied to application using the library

long_desc.thetext:
This has come up before, in the context of qx.Desktop, but is now even more critical for qx.Mobile.
When creating a library containing one or more widgets, using qx.Mobile, there are CSS files that all applications using that library must include. The CSS files in the library's resource directory do not get referenced/copied/linked/? to an application's resource directory when doing "generate.py source" so a source version of an application using a mobile library doesn't work.
Furthermore, a "generate.py build" fails due to there being no css directory in an application created by "create-application.py".
